house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 2000 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX On Tatum Realty RE/MAX On Tatum Realty

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings,Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Game Room, Garage DoorOpener, Great Room, Kitchen Island, Library, Microwave, Pantry
